commands.name: !therun
responses: Interested in seeing extra details and statistics about my splits as I speedrun? Check my profile on TheRun.gg, and click the live button to see realtime updates on my current run! https://therun.gg/live/Elite_Spud

commands.name: !blind_recurring
responses: This is a blind playthrough, which means that I know nothing about this game want to keep it that way. Do not tell me how to play the game. Do not spoil. Do not fake spoil. Do not hint, backseat, advise, guide, remind, or warn me in any way, please. Consider all questions to be rhetorical. Revel in my ignorance, and enjoy my suffering.

commands.name: !spoilerdiscord_recurring
responses: Wanna talk spoilers without posting directly in twitch chat? I've got a dedicated channel for spoiler-y discussion in the Discord server! https://discord.gg/f4bhKYxPy8

commands.name: !youtube
responses: VODs get posted here (in higher quality than streams!): https://www.youtube.com/@elite_spud
Blind playthroughs and other interesting streams get uploaded to YouTube here: https://www.youtube.com/@elite_spud
Miss a playthrough you really wanted to catch? I archive my streams locally at 1440p and post them on YouTube! https://www.youtube.com/@elite_spud

commands.name: !discord
responses: We have a Discord server! Join in and be a part of the community offstream! https://discord.gg/f4bhKYxPy8
Want consistent notifications when the stream is live? Join the Discord server and request a role to always get pinged! https://discord.gg/f4bhKYxPy8

commands.name: !music
responses: I collect music CDs and keep track of what I listen to as a hobby. You can judge my music taste here https://rateyourmusic.com/~elite_spud and here https://www.last.fm/user/elite_spud
I've been building up a small collection of music CDs for a few years. See what I've got and what I've been listening to https://rateyourmusic.com/~elite_spud & https://www.last.fm/user/elite_spud

In my spare time, I curate a small music CD collection, mostly focused around heavy, progressive, dark, and ambient genres. Check out what I have at https://rateyourmusic.com/~elite_spud + https://www.last.fm/user/elite_spud and feel free to shoot me a recommendation if you've got one!

commands.name: !instagram
responses: I have an instagram where I post pictures of my cats and also cool places I travel to https://www.instagram.com/elite.spud/
Hey, wanna see some cute cats? https://www.instagram.com/elite.spud/

commands.name: !av
responses: Wanna know how many wires are in my AV setup? Or what it takes to play GameBoy games on a PC monitor? Check out the diagram I made to keep up with it all, and don't be afraid to ask me questions about any specific components: https://gist.github.com/elite-spud/6f82f3da9d586df553757fa134278845

Wondering what kind of hardware I use to stream/play console games? Take a look at my layout diagram to see how everything hooks together: https://gist.github.com/elite-spud/6f82f3da9d586df553757fa134278845. Don't be afraid to ask questions about how everything works!

commands.name: !hardware
responses: You can find a list of all the parts in my PC / stream setup here: https://pcpartpicker.com/user/ghetto_spud/saved/djj7RB

commands.name: !pendinggames
responses: I maintain a list of all the games I've streamed (and might stream) here: https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1JsdDfmdjaL3d-oGsuq38z_jhrvkhePF1LLz4W1dpzI4/edit?usp=sharing and keep a tier list of my blind playthroughs here: https://pastebin.com/fRPKHM7D You can also check my pastebin profile for some of my more substantial opinions on certain games: https://pastebin.com/u/ghetto_spud

commands.name: !github
responses: I (Spud) wrote this chatbot myself because I'm a big nerd. If you fancy yourself a nerd too, you can peruse the source code on GitHub here: https://github.com/elite-spud/spudbot
This chatbot is © Spud Inc., which maintains an open policy of showcasing all the programming mistakes of the chatbot author for all to see here: https://github.com/elite-spud/spudbot
I'm a software engineer by day, and this chatbot is actually one of my side-projects! If you want to see how it works, you can find all the source code here: https://github.com/elite-spud/spudbot

commands.name: !glitchwave
responses: I took the time to catalog and rate all the games I've played over the years. Take a peek at my favorites and not-so-favorites here: https://glitchwave.com/user/elite_spud/
Curious if I've played your favorite game before, and/or what my opinions about it are? Look no further: https://glitchwave.com/user/elite_spud/
Got a favorite game? Me too: https://glitchwave.com/user/elite_spud/

commands.name: !baby
responses: We're having a baby! Her name is Lilah and she's set to arrive on/around August 3! Expect the stream schedule to pause for a while once our little Tater Tot gets here ♥ https://www.instagram.com/p/CoI-jAzuL_B/

commands.name: !hydrate
responses: Friendly reminder to take a sip of water, take any meds or vitamins you need, and grab a snack if you're hungry.

commands.name: !rules
responses: Chat Rules: • No bigotry, harassment, or intolerance allowed. Respect other folks or be banned • Don't spoil anything • Don't tell me how to play the game • Don't trauma dump. I want to cultivate a safe and positive space in my chat • Keep any political / religious discussions civil and infrequent • Stream is generally PG to PG-13. I prefer not to swear for my own reasons, but don't really care if you do (within reason) • No shortened hyperlinks • No self-promotion spam • Don't be a dingus •

commands.name: !pronouns
responses: Spud's pronouns are They/She. See other chatters' pronouns and set your own here: https://pronouns.alejo.io/

commands.name: !gender
responses: Non-binary transfeminine. They/She pronouns. Sapphic. Hormone therapy since Dec 2020.

commands.name: !rhetorical
responses: Do not tell me how to play the game. Do not spoil. Do not fake spoil. Do not hint, backseat, advise, guide, remind, or warn me in any way, please. Consider all questions to be rhetorical. Revel in my ignorance, and enjoy my suffering.

commands.name: !ta
responses: To play Total Annihilation on Windows 10, I use a program called DXWND to run the game in a window that tricks the game into thinking it's fullscreen. My method for doing that is detailed here: https://pastebin.com/2jBtcvqt

commands.name: !angie
responses: Angie the RNG mouse: https://i.imgur.com/YqBJbJX.jpeg

commands.name: !split
responses: Don't forget to split, ya dingus!

commands.name: !captions
responses: I use Web Captioner for my on-screen captions https://webcaptioner.com/ and the Stylish browser extension to force a custom font https://userstyles.org/styles/251887/web-captioner-undertale-font

responses: https://i.imgur.com/uZtU5PY.png

responses: https://i.imgur.com/4FIRGa0.png

commands.name: !frostfatales
responses: I participated in Frost Fatales 2023 by running Luigi's Mansion 100%! Check out the VOD here if you missed it: https://youtu.be/hvXPqOkV9xU

commands.name: !incentive
responses: At 25 Sub points, I'll do a blindfolded playthrough of Luigi's Mansion PAL version. I have no idea if that's even been done before, so that probably means it'll be a big, crazy adventure!

commands.name: !TDoV
responses: March 31 is Transgender Day of Visibility! As a trans person who's also observable in the visible spectrum of electromagnetic radiation, I'm here playing games and being proud about myself in the most public way I can. Not every trans person has the privilege to make themselves visible, though, so I think it's important to stand in solidarity with those who aren't yet able. We exist, we are strong, and our voices will be heard.

commands.name: !corathon
responses: At 12:00 CST on April 8, I'll be taking part in Corathon, an upcoming speedrunning marathon, by showcasing Luigi's Mansion 100%! This event will benefit Cora, a friend-of-a-friend who's trying to move out of Texas to a more trans-friendly part of the US, a reality I'm all too familiar with. There's a lot of amazing games and amazing people featured in this marathon, so be sure to mark your calendars! To see the full schedule, please visit https://horaro.org/corathon/schedule.

commands.name: !max%
responses: Max% is: All Toads, All Gold Frames, & All Money (142,390,000G)

commands.name: !happy
responses: Pride!

commands.name: !HAPPY
responses: PRIDE!

commands.name: !tournament
responses: I'm participating in the annual Luigi's Mansion Any% No OoB tournament this year as both a runner and a commentator! Check out the bracket https://challonge.com/LMTournament2023 and schedule https://schedule.speedgaming.org/lm/#

commands.name: git gud
responses: git: 'gud' is not a git command. See 'git --help'

commands.name: git --help
responses: usage: git [--help] <command> [<args>]     These are common Git commands used in various situations: add, google, pull, push, reset, status

commands.name: git add
responses: Your name has been added to the list. The FBI will be in contact with you shortly.

One of the four basic operations of arithmetic, adding was first invented on November 10, 1969 when the educational children's television series, Sesame Street, premiered on the American television station, PBS.
Adding has been deprecated. From now on, we recommend subtracting negative values instead
Nothing specified, nothing added.    hint: Maybe you wanted to say 'git add .'?

commands.name: git add .
responses: Your '.' has been received. We appreciate such generosity in these trying times.

commands.name: git google
responses: Step 1 of using git: google how to use git

commands.name: git pull
responses: The gravity of Earth, denoted by g, is the net acceleration imparted to objects due to the combined effect of gravitational pull (from mass distribution within Earth) and the centrifugal force (from the Earth's rotation). Near the surface, the pull of Earth's gravity is approximately 9.81 meters per second per second.

pull (ˈpu̇l) v. 1: To exert force upon so as to cause or tend to cause motion toward the force    2: To extract    3: To draw the support or attraction of    [Middle English, from Old English pullian]

commands.name: git push
responses: You extert as much force as you can, but nothing budges. It appears the chatbot is immovable.

commands.name: git reset
responses: Your progress has been reset, and your save file has been erased.
Manual override detected, Rebooting...
Resetting is impossible. There is no way out.
